title: narulaara chEDi
sahitya:
narulAra cEDi poyyedaru nAmasAra merugaka mIru O



caraNam 1



 shAstrAdula bramalO tagili mI rapAtrulaiyundurE gAka satpAtramunu 

teliyalEka anya tIrthAlu yAtralu nenduku shuka shAstramu telusukOka O



caraNam 2



 pakSamunu bUni kakSula jEri mA rakSakuni dalapalEru brahma rAkSasulai 

buTTedaru mA lakSmaNAgrajuni vIkSaNa galgina akSayapadamonderu O



caraNam 3



 brahmamEkamani dharmamu luNDaga karmamatulai poyyedaru A marmamu 

teliya jAlaru immahilOpala durmatulai brahmamidi yadiyani yallADedaru O



caraNam 4



 sOmuDu rAmuDu vEmAru jeppina gAni yEmaru cunnAnu mIru vAriddaru 

vErunu gAru sOmuDE bhadrAdri rAmuDani bhajiyincaNDi mI abbatODu O
